Runio helps you stay fit with virtual challenges that you can deliver anytime, anywhere, at your own pace and with your favorite sport. We sync with your tracker (selected brands) or you can upload your activities manually to deliver against the challenge target. Upon completing the challenge you receive a medal delivered to you via post.

About our challenges
Our distance based, thematic challenges provide motivation for regular exercise with your favorite sport. You can participate with any supported exercise type, e.g. running, walking, swimming, hiking, cycling, etc.
The distance target of each challenge is set and we also provide a recommended timeframe within which our challenges should be completed. Users can extend their time limits to the maximum indicated at each challenge (typically up to 365 days, if not stated otherwise) if they need more time than the default setting. Users can break up the challenge targets to as many activities as they like, and can conquer the challenge at their own pace, anywhere. 

Accessing our challenges
Users can browse our challenges and create a profile on Runio free of charge. Participation on our events may require purchasing a ticket, which includes the fact that all finishers get a medal with delivery cost subject to their location (it may be free or charged). Tickets to our challenges can be purchased directly on the Runio app or on our website (www.runio.app).


Automatic sync with trackers or Manual activity entry
There are two options to complete our challenges
A) Through automatic sync with selected tracker brands. At launch, we provide this option for Fitbit, Garmin and Strava users. The list of supported trackers will be updated on www.runio.app. If a user sets up a connection through the Runio app with their above trackers, their activities will automatically synced with Runio after the user has recorded them on their tracker and it will count against the respective challenge target.
B) Manual entry: users can log activities manually on Runio by providing the date, time, duration, type of activity. We do not validate manually entered items separately.
The availability of Manual entry may be limited in certain challenges, please check the detailed challenge description of each challenge for details. 

Tracking progress and Statistics
Runio maps the user's progress vs the challenge target onto a virtual map with a virtual challenge route and also provides statistics about the distance, duration and number of various activity types of each user. Users also appear on a leaderboard in a challenge where they can see their position vs other users who have completed the same challenge.

Notifications
Runio provides users with various in app or push notifications linked to their activities, milestones, ranking, activity level, system or administrator messages.

Your medal
Each finisher is entitled to receive a special medal to commemorate the completion of their challenge. Medals are delivered via post (check countries we ship to on our website), there is no alternative option of pick-up in store, etc.

Availability: in EU only
Runio challenges are available for users in the EU only and we deliver medals to also to addresses only within the EU. Delivery options and fees if any are indicated at checkout.

**Stryd learns what kind of runner you are and adapts to your ever improving fitness to prescribe run training that is personalized and specific to your skill set. You receive sweet spot run training guidance that will train you to improve your performance and continually build on those gains for weeks, months, and even years at a time.

Through a combination of advanced sensor technology and an automated training ecosystem, you will be given your personalized & optimal training routine, stride-by-stride guidance during every run, and in-depth insights that help all runners, from beginners to Olympic champions, regularly push their running performance to the next level.

How to start with Stryd:

New to Stryd? This app requires the Stryd pod in order to use the app.
Already have Stryd? You can sign in with your Stryd account, pair your pod, and get started with the app.

Perfect Pacing During Every Run:

Stryd accounts for your speed, slope, run form, fatigue, and wind to deliver perfect, precise, and painless pacing. This is accomplished with the Stryd pod. The pod is filled with motion & environmental sensors that comprehensively determine your running effort in nearly every running condition. With this info, you can evenly pace every run, which means you get the performance enhancing benefits from each training session — without undue fatigue.

Sweet Spot Training Every Day:

Stryd learns who you are as a runner and then prescribes daily training that is personalized to your current fitness. Next, you can import these workouts on your sportswatch and receive stride-by-stride guidance so you run at the right performance-enhancing intensity from start to finish. You stay in the training sweet spot, where you are perfectly balancing stress and rest, so that you receive the maximal benefits from each session and continue to improve.

Automated Insights That Keep You Improving:

Stryd analyzes and compares your similar training sessions against each other to let you know how your fitness is trending. You will know how much your recent training is paying off if you are moving in the right direction. If there is an opportunity to do better, you can quickly identify if you need to update your routine so you can keep the improvements coming.

Continually Beat Your Race Times:

Stryd plans your perfect race for you. Stryd can account for the unique layout of your race course, the weather, the altitude, your skillset, and your overall fitness to prescribe a race plan that will ensure you perform at your peak capability. You will step up to the starting line with confidence knowing that you will run your best race possible.

-----

Note that, Stryd uses GPS in the background to track your running distance and pace, and continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life. Stryd also integrates with the Health app in order to get access to the heart rate data from Apple Watch.

Additionally, Stryd integrates with Apple Health. This allows Stryd to automatically update your weight, access your heart rate data, and save activity data to your Health app.

ZEISS Hunting for the modern hunter – with hunting maps, ballistics calculator, hunting diary, hunting weather and much more! Connect your ZEISS DTC 3, ZEISS DTI 3 and ZEISS Victory RF via Bluetooth and WiFi and use the extensive app features.
* Ballistics: Calculations tailored to your ZEISS riflescope and even to riflescopes from other brands
* Hunting Grounds: Create your hunting grounds and manage them together with fellow hunters
* Newsfeed: Receive ZEISS news and promotions and share content with your friends
* Hunting Diary: Document your trips and successes
* My Products: Easily record your equipment and important data
* Connected Products: Connect your ZEISS DTC 3 and ZEISS Victory RF with the app via Bluetooth and your ZEISS DTI 3 via WiFi
* Weather: Hourly weather data and 5-day forecast to plan your trip, as well as atmospheric data for precise ballistics calculation

ZEISS Hunting features in detail:

Ballistics Calculator: 
Calculate the ballistics for your long-range or angled shot – precisely tailored to your ZEISS Terra/Victory/Conquest riflescope and your reticle or ASV/ASV+ ballistic turret 
Get your results in imperial and metric units as tables and reticles, including ASV data. For riflescopes from other manufacturers, use the ballistics table.

Atmospheric data ensures the correct calculation for your on-target long-range shot.  

For even more precision, simply calculate the ballistic coefficients for your ammunition.

Save ballistic profiles to have them at hand any time.


Sharing:
Set up your profile and create your friends list.

Keep your friends up-to-date about your hunting successes, ballistics and equipment by sharing your entries with them.


News:
Keep track of all shared entries from you and your friends, like and comment on your friends' posts and stay up-to-date with ZEISS product news and promotions. 


Hunting Grounds:
Draw the borders of your hunting ground, mark no-go areas and define points of interest like raised hide, high seat, feeding point and many more on your Ground Map.

Set the permissions for fellow hunters on the hunting ground. They can also use your hunting ground maps, support you in the management or add diary entries to the hunting ground.
Configure your map settings and use practical map features such as your current position in the area and Geo-Fencing to support you during the hunt.

Assign your diary entries to your hunting grounds for administration.


Hunting Diary: 
Choose from an extensive type list and note down the weight, gender and age. This can also be used for comparing with the shooting plan.

Easily mark kill, shot and sighting position and other incidents on the Hunting Ground map using GPS.

Photos and videos complete your entry.


My Products:
Record your equipment in the app clearly and have all important information at hand, such as invoice, trader, serial number and manual.

Connected Products:
Easily configure your ZEISS Victory RF in the app via Bluetooth. By synchronizing with your ballistic profiles, your range finder will provide you with calculations that are precisely tuned to your ballistics.
Conveniently manage the device settings of your ZEISS DTC 3 in the app via Bluetooth. Remote-control your device and use the Zeroing Assistant to set up zeroing profiles directly from within the app. 
Live-stream to your ZEISS DTI 3 via WiFi. Easily manage your thermal images and videos in the app gallery and share them on social media.
Weather Forecast: 
Detailed 5-day forecast, additionally providing wind direction, wind strength and air pressure as well as the daily moon and solar cycle.

Sign-up benefits:
The data of registered users is backed up on ZEISS servers. It is therefore saved if equipment is lost and can be accessed on a variety of end devices.

White Risk is the SLF avalanche app for all those who engage in winter activities in the mountains outside marked and open pistes. It gives access to the interactive avalanche bulletin as well as the latest snow and weather data for Switzerland. White Risk also provides background knowledge to assist in assessing the avalanche danger, and tools to facilitate planning both before departure and en route, for ski touring, snowshoe hiking and freeriding expeditions.

The app’s Tour function allows tours planned on the web platform to be viewed offline on topographical maps with slope angles. Tours can also be planned or edited directly in the app.
